english.segment1: I Have Heard about the Days of old. About the men who followed You. And how they saw the Supernatural. And became the chosen few
english.segment2: So I come before You now. Tearing off my earthly crowns. for this one thing I have Found
english.segment3: I want Faith Like That. To see the dead rise. or to see You pass by. Oh I, I want Faith Like That. Whatever the cost. I'll suffer the loss, Oh I. I want Faith Like That
english.segment4: I'm not Looking for a miracle. Signs and Wonders are things thereof. I caught a glimps of what You want from me. and what I have is not enough
english.segment5: I read the story one more time. of Those who gave to You Their lives. With no fear or compromise
english.segment6: I want Faith Like That. To see the dead rise. or to see You pass by. Oh I, I want Faith Like That. Whatever the cost. I'll suffer the loss, Oh I. I want the Faith That can move any mountain. and send them to the sea. I want the Faith that can break every stronghold. That keeps you, keeps you from me
english.segment7: I want Faith Like That. To see the dead rise. or to see You pass by. Oh I, I want Faith Like That
english.segment8: I want Faith Like That. To see the dead rise. or to see You pass by. Oh I, I want Faith Like That. Whatever the cost. I'll suffer the loss, Oh I. I want Faith Like That, a Faith like that
